contributionDescription: I want to contribute to the optimistic ecosystem and I am very interested and want to get rewards from RetroPGF, I really look forward to RetroPGF becoming more famous in the future, I also look forward to what tasks have to be done, I hope I can also get prizes from it, that's the reason I want to contribute in the optimism ecosystem, such as RetroPGF
impactDescription: Of course I chose the end user experience & adoption category, because it will have an impact on the situation, such as maybe because of fud or not having capital, and that will cause end users, but I will prove it and give my experience so that they trust it again for new users or old user
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged due to rule violation 1: Promises of future impact. The applicant states, "I really look forward to RetroPGF becoming more famous in the future" and "I hope I can also get prizes from it," which can be considered promises of future deliverables or impact.
